website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive game that also makes a great stocking stuffer, you can't go wrong with Mad Libs – a popular word game for generations.
pros: Classic Mad Libs word game with a Christmas theme that focuses on popular carols
Contains newer stories (than other Christmas Mad Libs)
Makes an affordable stocking stuffer for school-aged kids and teens
cons: Some kids may not "get" the ad lib concept or enjoy word games

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a favorite
customer_reviews.text: My daughter definitely did not like this as much as regular mad libs. Perhaps because she doesn't know the tunes to all the carols. Keep this is mind for kids that are on the younger side. She and her friends much preferred the wimpy kid mad libs that they also received in their stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent family fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for all of our holiday parties this year! The back of the story has place with all the words you need to fill in so one person can fill in the blanks and read the story without 'cheating' and reading the story as they go. We just use a pencil and reuse the stories time after time. So much silliness and fun! We order all kinds of mad libs books to take on family vacations and road trips also. Best way to pass the time as family and keep the laughs coming!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected and described.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew as a stocking stuffer. He wasn't impressed (guessing bc of his age), but the adults really enjoyed it and did many right there before dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J Fortney

customer_reviews.title: Family enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a real hit for our daughter and upper elementary age grandsons during month of December! They took it with them on outings with family or with friends.
customer_reviews.author: JeLoMe

customer_reviews.title: Will make you giggle!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves MAD LIBS and I love that it helps her read, use her imagination and remember what all the English grammar are. Some things don't make any sense, but me and my daughter always get a laugh together when doing these and that is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring to Christmas party and it was a lot of fun. Hadn’t played this game in decades and it’s still a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: HDV

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like Mad Libs...
customer_reviews.text: But, after a few of these, I had to question whether Mad Libs are actually funny. I mean, they're clearly not funny any more, as it turns out, but now I'm wondering if they ever were... This is probably still fun for kids and teenagers though. 2/5 would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: For those who grew up doing mad libs - introduce your younger generations to these. We had such fun sitting around doing these as a family around Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Reade

customer_reviews.title: Who can beat mad libs?
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter LOVES mad libs. She played with it, making up silly stories for days. I plan to get her more.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Brant

customer_reviews.title: FUN TIMES
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this. Every year we have a Christmas Cousins Sleepover. This year they all took turns and had a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: JMomC

customer_reviews.title: Part of a dirty santa gift.
customer_reviews.text: Going to be part of a dirty santa gift. Always enjoyed mad libs as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Red Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely good family fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our holiday road trip. Hilarity ensued. Classic mad libs.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love mad libs
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love mad libs? These are so much fun.. and a great way to reinforce the parts of speech!! Who said learning can't be HYSTERICAL??!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Always fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grand nephews...... they had a good time with them. I'm sure I will buy more next year.
customer_reviews.author: George & Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with this on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Crazed reader

customer_reviews.title: Madlibs at Christmas...yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love a good madlibs at Christmas? Cannot wait to do these with my family. Brings back the best memories.
customer_reviews.author: Marney

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Brought warmth to our home and laughter to our _________hearts, and_______ Ears.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Stocking perfection
customer_reviews.text: This Madlibs was a perfect stocking stuffer! Also want to point out that it asked for ADVERBS! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Its madlibs
customer_reviews.text: Its madlibs. Its fun. It was prime, so it came super fast. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Good seller with quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, very fun to complete as a family
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A lot of good, clean, fun.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun on Christmas! My 6, 7 & 10 year olds loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good for the classroom.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my music classroom after our Christmas concert. It's nice because it helps the kids review parts of speech while having fun with the songs! Plus I have the kids sing them to their classmates so they get that extra performance and singing experience. Super fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: HitTheTrail

customer_reviews.title: makes a great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Mad Libs are a classic fun word game for the whole family. This one makes a great Christmas gift and entertained my children for hours! Plus, it helps them with grammar.
customer_reviews.author: savedbygrace

customer_reviews.title: Too funny to pass up
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! Gives the kids something to do while adults are cooking! The stories are easy and short enough to keep preschoolers entertained.
customer_reviews.author: USMCWife1

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning book
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these books and had been begging me for one. Ordered it to put in his stocking. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amandad022

customer_reviews.title: Fun for school Christmas party
customer_reviews.text: My kids had never heard of or done MadLibs so I bought them for their teachers to use at the school Christmas party. The class loved them!
customer_reviews.author: mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Loved 'em then...love them now!
customer_reviews.text: Loved MadLibs when I was a kid. Now my 8-year-old loves them, too! Can't find too many things from my childhood that she actually enjoys, besides Barbies. This was a walk down memory lane!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: How could it be less than 5 starts. It’s Mad Libs!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hov

customer_reviews.title: Educational and fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mad libs are so much fun and my Son is way ahead of his classmates in being able to recognize nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, and plurals. Since they are familiar Christmas carols we sing them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hahl

customer_reviews.title: ... during a car trip and the entire family had fun. We took turns filling out the blanks by ...
customer_reviews.text: We played this during a car trip and the entire family had fun. We took turns filling out the blanks by calling on individuals and then the person filling it out had to sing the Christmas Carol aloud. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hallford

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot of fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family has enjoyed this. Be sure to use it before Christmas as it adds enjoyment throughout the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Mad Libs so did my son and now my grandchildren. Great fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: TeedaGreen

customer_reviews.title: Silly, as always
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, ages 12, 7, & 6, just love Mad Libs. I got the Christmas one to keep them busy when we went to the nursing home to spend time with my mother-in-law. They got the adults in on adding words and we all enjoyed it when the kids sang some of the answers.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Ho Ho Ho  Merry Xmas
customer_reviews.text: I started playing this one by myself during lunch break or during downtime, may take it with me to play with family at Christ,as.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Played these when I was a kid and now have fun playing with my grandson. Good way to learn sentence structure
customer_reviews.author: SheriB

customer_reviews.title: Fun holiday activity for families
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to do with family and friends for the holidays! Very cute book.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Richardson

customer_reviews.title: insert fun here
customer_reviews.text: mad libs keep my 9 year old boy busy during car rides both long and short. we ordered lots and handed them out as little christmas gifts to his friends. this christmas version is one of our personal favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Wende Moore

customer_reviews.title: Madlibs for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Planning a Christmas party and this was just what I had in mind to make it a bit more fun for all!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting all of these to be songs, but many were narratives.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: like I had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: I gave my 11 year old niece this. She had never played before, like I had as a kid, we all laughed a while and played together. She enjoyed it too.
customer_reviews.author: bcarr444

customer_reviews.title: Best for younger kids maybe
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was cute, my kids didnt like it and wouldnt participate. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. S.

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: We took these with us on a two day road trip for Christmas. The kids couldn’t get enough of them! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for for the Christmas season to play on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Sun

customer_reviews.title: had some good laughs!
customer_reviews.text: Plan on using at a classroom party. Tried it out on my 10 year old daughter. ..had some good laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dunn

customer_reviews.title: always fun
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas themed mad libs with funny carols and stories. Can be used alone or with friends as they have some that allow you list words then fill them in if you are doing it alone. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Picky CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: we ALL had fun with THIS on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Oh, we ALL had fun with THIS on Christmas! It reminded us of being kids and we laughed until we cried - just like we used to. Fun stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Silly family fun
customer_reviews.text: These books are great! I have an 8 year old and a 6 year old. We do the mad libs together and we laugh at the results every time. Hilarious stuff. Great way to learn some grammar too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Mad libs has been a favorite for my kids and grand kids for over 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Mad libs has been a favorite for my kids and grand kids for over 30 years. It trancinds generations.
customer_reviews.author: toni couch

customer_reviews.title: Not-a-Video-Game Fun
customer_reviews.text: I love hearing my kids laugh uncontrollably after spending time thinking about various parts is speech to insert into these short vignettes. I use them in my classroom, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Mad Libs
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages. My 7 year old loves Mad Libs. This is a great way to spend time as a family or with guest. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mo0o0o0o0o

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved these
customer_reviews.text: Great holdiay season fun. My kids sat around the dinner table giggling and giving the most silly answers to the blanks one can imagine. But the end result for them was lots of laughs. I would definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with cousin's daughters
customer_reviews.text: Ages 8-13, they took these on a road trip at Christmas. Great for an inexpensive gift for a broad age range.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Funny! Great for the Holidays!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. My nephews love Mad Libs. Great to have a holiday edition for Christmas parties, etc.! Good, good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! Just like when we did them in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! Just like when we did them in the '70's.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Jubelt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that all derivatives of the word "fart" could bring so many laughs. Deck the farts with boughs of farts, fa la la la la la la la la!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bush

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun addition to all of our Christmas gatherings. It was great for all age levels and we could all participate!
customer_reviews.author: beareft

customer_reviews.title: There's no reason not to buy Mad Libs great products
customer_reviews.text: This certainly brings me back to my childhood and reminds me of what an adverb is LOL. Mad Libs has not changed very much in the past 20 years and it remains entertaining for both adults and the kids. The Christmas edition has cute stories and we all had a few laughs. This item is great to keep the kids busy for a bit, it is cheap enough to buy as an extra birthday gift or as a stocking stuffer and I recommend it for all kids - boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: Allfruit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family road trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family road trip so that we wouldn't get bored in the care. We were a group of 7 all over the age of 30 and we loved it! I'm glad that we had it since our 5 hr trip turned into a 10 hr trip. Just a fun, clean way to pass some time.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Madlibs for school fun!
customer_reviews.text: My students love this book! We had a great time using the funny Christmas carol related madlibs in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 y/o loves Madlibs and the themed ones are super fun! A great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Carol Mad Libs:  Very Merry Songs & Stories
customer_reviews.text: I remember playing this when I was a kid. Still a lot of fun and laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Rampage

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Mad Libs
customer_reviews.text: Service was very good with this book. It wasn't quite the product I was looking for, but I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: sandys1771
